title: Cults
description:
Angela Sawyer, Ryan Estrada and Barb Poe share stories about a cult that made music, a cult that prayed, if not played, and a dangerous cult in a karate school.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (George Harrison, Yoko Ono, Ryan Estrada, People's Temple Choir, DJ SaeOne, Barb Poe, Taj Easton, Angela Sawyer, Kevin Allison)
